Name: Ship Surge
Description: Raise the rates on maritime routes and increase shipping amount.

Name: Chop Chop Chaos
Description: Cut down more trees for a greater timber yield.

Name: Industrial Invasion
Description: Expand your manufacturing capabilities, but it will have adverse effect on the environment

Name: Wasteland
Description: Increase profits through efficient waste management, but risk environmental contamination.

Name: Paper Recycling
Description: Recycle paper to conserve wood resources and reduce waste.

Name: Leakage Lockdown
Description: Implement water-saving measures and fixing leaks.

Name: Forest Restoration
Description: Plant trees to restore forests and create new habitats for animals.

Name: Reduce, Reuse, Recycle
Description: Reduce waste generation and promote sustainable consumption.
